name: Cinderella Deluxe
description:
Don’t be a pumpkin, experience the classic fairy tale, Cinderella in this wonderful

interactive book for young readers. The sisters are just as ugly as the original but you

can now read the story while tapping the characters and objects on each page, all with

their own quirky animation. Cinderella you shall go to the ball!

Features:

• The classic version of "Cinderella" by Charles Perrault

• Enchanting artwork and animation

• More than 120 interactive elements (change to lots for Lite)

• Tap the pages to see the characters come to life

• Find 60 hidden stars to unlock the bonus game (Take out)

• Get Cinderella ready for the ball – dress her up, do her makeup and design her

shoes (Take out)

• Help her do her chores - wash the dishes with Cinderella and chop up cooking

ingredients

• Put the famous glass slipper on the feet of different women (Take out)

• Twirl the dancing Cinderella and Prince with your fingers (Take out)

• Amazing colouring book and interactive jigsaw puzzles (singular)

• Available in English, German, French, Ukrainian and Russian
